issue.title: [R][CI] Parallelize Windows CI jobs
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-14107](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-14107). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
We've been having some timeouts lately. The build is long because it builds everything 2 or 3 times, and some of that could be parallelized with a different GHA workflow.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-14107?focusedCommentId=17421600) by Neal Richardson (npr):*
Issue resolved by pull request 11221
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/11221>
